basics.name: Alexandre Touret
basics.label: Software Architect
basics.summary:
I am senior software architect  with 22 years' experience passionate about technology, cloud and development. Throughout my career,I have designed, built and managed systems from small to large in various business contexts such as insurance, financial services or transport industries.

 I then enjoy sharing my knowledge by speaking at conferences, organizing workshops and writing articles.

work.name: Worldline Financial Services
work.summary:
As part of a development team in the French Acquiring Department:

- Technical management of developers and lead developers
- Design and promotion of development workflows which promote code quality in our projects
- Attend and support PCI DSS audits
- Promotion of best practices by conducting training sessions and workshops
- GITLABCI CI/CD pipelines design and development
- Software engineering on JAVA platform (JAVAEE and SPRING)
- Software design
- Pre sales support
- Technology watch and participation in technical labs
- Speaker at some internal and external events.

Environment: JAVA, SPRING (BOOT,...), JAVAEE, DOCKER, OPENSHIFT (KUBERNETES, HELM), GITLAB, REST, MONGODB, Google Cloud Platform

As part of the Worldline Expert Community and the Global Architecture Department:
 
Payment related applications Architecture audit and review
- Functional and software architecture review
- Workshop holding to identify potential improvements roadmaps
- Production platforms risk analysis 
Standards definition and promotion
Organising and facilitating workshops (international context) about software architecture.
Speaker in french and international tech conferences (Jnation, DevoxxUK, VolcampIO, TouraineTech,...)
